label: Route Planning and Mapping
description: Tools and services for planning and mapping routes for travel, delivery, and logistics.
intents: Find the best route for delivery
Map out a walking or cycling route

subcategories.label: Road Trip Planning
subcategories.description: Tools and services for planning road trips, including mapping routes, finding attractions, and booking accommodations.

subcategories.label: Delivery Route Planning
subcategories.description: Tools and services for planning delivery routes, including optimizing for time and distance, and finding service stations.

subcategories.label: Walking and Cycling Route Planning
subcategories.description: Tools and services for planning walking and cycling routes, including finding trails, measuring distances, and tracking progress.

subcategories.label: International Travel Planning
subcategories.description: Tools and services for planning international travel, including finding flights, booking accommodations, and obtaining visas.

subcategories.label: Mapping and Navigation
subcategories.description: Tools and services for mapping and navigation, including GPS devices, online maps, and satellite imagery.
